item.title: U.S. Navy Sails To 2025 Recruiting Target Three Months Ahead Of Schedule
item.description: With the wind in its sails, the U.S. Navy hit its recruiting goal for the 2025 fiscal year three months ahead of schedule, the service announced Wedne...

item.title: U.S. Attorney Chased By Illegal Alien With Knife In Albany
item.description: Criminal behavior is what we can expect from people who started their relationship with this country by entering illegally.

item.title: Going Soft On Illegal Labor Is A Betrayal Of American Workers Like My Family
item.description: Competitors blew past my parents like they were standing still, mostly thanks to the stream of cheap, illegal labor my parents refused to tap into.

item.title: Why Non-Woke Indie Video Games Like Clair Obscur Are Going Gangbusters
item.description: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 presages the fall of woke gaming titans in its own indie gaming moment because it refused to bow to leftist ideology.
